name: PONG (itch) (Charlie117)
description:
Hi everyone!

My name is Carlos Calderon Reyes Student at the University Iberoamericana de la Ciudad de Puebla, and I wanted to present a small game developed for the subject of "Selected Themes of Animation".

I'm open to all kinds of recommendations, and I hope the game can be enjoyed. I'm still learning so I'm sorry in advance if there are a lot of mistakes.
